21 #include <QtDcmPreferences.h>
22 #include <QtDcmManager.h>
23 
24 class QtDcmPreferencesPrivate
25 {
26 public:
27  QFile iniFile;
28  QString aetitle;
29  QString port;
30  QString hostname;
32  bool useDcm2nii;
33  QString dcm2niiPath;
35  QList<QtDcmServer *> servers;
36 };
37 
38 QtDcmPreferences * QtDcmPreferences::_instance = 0;
39 
40 QtDcmPreferences::QtDcmPreferences() : d ( new QtDcmPreferencesPrivate )
41 {
42 }

44 QtDcmPreferences* QtDcmPreferences::instance()
45 {
46  if ( _instance == 0 )
47  _instance = new QtDcmPreferences();
48  return _instance;
49 }
50 
51 void QtDcmPreferences::addServer()
52 {
53  d->servers.append ( new QtDcmServer );
54 }
55 
56 void QtDcmPreferences::removeServer ( int index )
57 {
58  d->servers.removeAt ( index );
59 }
60 
61 void QtDcmPreferences::readSettings()
62 {
63  if ( !d->iniFile.exists() )
64  this->setDefaultIniFile();
65  //Instantiate a QSettings object from the ini file.
66  QSettings prefs ( d->iniFile.fileName(), QSettings::IniFormat );
67  //Load local settings
68  prefs.beginGroup ( "LocalSettings" );
69  d->aetitle = prefs.value ( "AETitle" ).toString();
70  d->port = prefs.value ( "Port" ).toString();
71  d->hostname = prefs.value ( "Hostname" ).toString();
72  prefs.endGroup();
73 
74  prefs.beginGroup ( "Converter" );
75  d->useDcm2nii = prefs.value ( "UseDcm2nii" ).toBool();
76  d->dcm2niiPath = prefs.value ( "Dcm2nii" ).toString();
77  prefs.endGroup();
78 
79  //For each server load corresponding settings
80  prefs.beginGroup ( "Servers" );
81  for ( int i = 0; i < prefs.childGroups().size(); i++ )
82  {
83  d->servers.append ( new QtDcmServer );
84  d->servers.at ( i )->setAetitle ( prefs.value ( "Server" + QString::number ( i + 1 ) + "/AETitle" ).toString() );
85  d->servers.at ( i )->setHostname ( prefs.value ( "Server" + QString::number ( i + 1 ) + "/Hostname" ).toString() );
86  d->servers.at ( i )->setPort ( prefs.value ( "Server" + QString::number ( i + 1 ) + "/Port" ).toString() );
87  d->servers.at ( i )->setName ( prefs.value ( "Server" + QString::number ( i + 1 ) + "/Name" ).toString() );
88  }
89  prefs.endGroup();
90 
91  emit preferencesUpdated();
92 }
93 
94 void QtDcmPreferences::writeSettings()
95 {
96  //Remove settings file
97  QFile ini ( d->iniFile.fileName() );
98  ini.remove();
99  //Instantiate a QSettings object with the ini file.
100  QSettings prefs ( d->iniFile.fileName(), QSettings::IniFormat );
101  //Write local settings from the private attributes
102  prefs.beginGroup ( "LocalSettings" );
103  prefs.setValue ( "AETitle", d->aetitle );
104  prefs.setValue ( "Port", d->port );
105  prefs.setValue ( "Hostname", d->hostname );
106  prefs.endGroup();
107 
108  prefs.beginGroup ( "Converter" );
109  prefs.setValue ( "Dcm2nii", d->dcm2niiPath );
110  prefs.setValue ( "UseDcm2nii", d->useDcm2nii );
111  prefs.endGroup();
112 
113  //Do the job for each server
114  prefs.beginGroup ( "Servers" );
115  for ( int i = 0; i < d->servers.size(); i++ )
116  {
117  prefs.beginGroup ( "Server" + QString::number ( i + 1 ) );
118  prefs.setValue ( "AETitle", d->servers.at ( i )->getAetitle() );
119  prefs.setValue ( "Hostname", d->servers.at ( i )->getHostname() );
120  prefs.setValue ( "Port", d->servers.at ( i )->getPort() );
121  prefs.setValue ( "Name", d->servers.at ( i )->getName() );
122  prefs.endGroup();
123  }
124 
125  prefs.endGroup();
126 
127  emit preferencesUpdated();
128 }
129 
130 void QtDcmPreferences::onUpdatePreferences()
131 {
132  this->writeSettings();
133 }
134

163 }

165 void QtDcmPreferences::onPacsRemoved ( int index )
166 {
167  this->removeServer(index);
168 }
169 
170 void QtDcmPreferences::setDefaultIniFile()
171 {
172  //Create an ini file with default parameters
173  d->aetitle = "QTDCM";
174  d->port = "2010";
175  d->hostname = "localhost";
176 
177  d->dcm2niiPath = "";
178  d->useDcm2nii = 0;
179 
180  QtDcmServer * server = new QtDcmServer();
181  server->setAetitle ( "SERVER" );
182  server->setHostname ( "hostname" );
183  server->setName ( "Server" + QString::number ( d->servers.size() + 1 ) );
184  server->setPort ( "11112" );
185  d->servers.append ( server );
186  this->writeSettings();
187 }
188 
189 QString QtDcmPreferences::getIniFile ( void )
190 {
191  return d->iniFile.fileName();
192 }
193 
194 void QtDcmPreferences::setIniFile ( const QString ini )
195 {
196  QDir iniDir = QDir ( QDir::homePath() + QDir::separator() + ".qtdcm" );
197 
198  if ( !iniDir.exists() )
199  QDir::home().mkdir ( ".qtdcm" );
200 
201  d->iniFile.setFileName ( iniDir.absolutePath() + QDir::separator() + ini );
202 
203  if ( !d->iniFile.exists() )
204  this->setDefaultIniFile(); //If it doesn't exist create it with default parameters
205  else
206  this->readSettings();
207 
208  emit preferencesUpdated();
209 }
